column1: Smoque BBQ////Didn't see what the hype was about these. Honestly
column2: of all of the hyped mac & cheeses I've had
column3: they were all marginally better than home-made box mac & cheese. Sure
column4: the textures a little different and you get some crunch
column5: and it's certainly a little better
column6: but not worth throwing a fit over.
